project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python script that generates a random password with specified criteria, including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters. The length of the password will be configurable by the user.

task.name: Allow user to specify the length of the password
Ensure inclusion of uppercase letters in the generated password
Ensure inclusion of lowercase letters in the generated password
Ensure inclusion of numbers in the generated password
Ensure inclusion of special characters in the generated password
Write tests for password generation functionality
Execute tests on the password generation functionality to ensure correct behavior
